function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relying solely on web scraping for COVID-19 data may result in incomplete or inaccurate information, increasing the risk of incorrect diagnosis and decision-making.","Impact":"Inaccurate data may lead to ineffective mitigation strategies and delayed response to outbreaks, exacerbating the spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Verify and cross-reference web-scraped data with multiple reliable sources to ensure accuracy and completeness. Implement algorithms for data validation and error-checking to minimize the impact of inaccurate data.","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, error-checking tools, cross-referencing software","People":"Health authorities, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Health organizations, data scientists, software developers"},{"Description":"Dependence on an expert system for early detection of COVID-19 may lead to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment, increasing the risk of disease transmission within the community.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis and delayed treatment can contribute to the spread of the disease and potentially worsen the health outcomes of affected individuals.","Mitigation":"Combine expert system results with traditional diagnostic methods for validation. Continuously update the expert system with new medical knowledge and research findings to improve accuracy.","Technologies":"Integration with traditional diagnostic tools, machine learning for continuous learning and updating","People":"Medical professionals, public health practitioners","Owner":"Medical institutions, research institutions, AI developers"},{"Description":"Lack of human expert oversight in the decision-making process based on the expert system's recommendations may lead to errors and adverse consequences in COVID-19 management.","Impact":"Inadequate human oversight may result in incorrect treatment plans, resource misallocation, and patient mismanagement, leading to increased transmission and negative health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Establish clear protocols for human review and validation of expert system outputs. Provide training to users on interpreting and using the expert system outputs effectively.","Technologies":"User interface for review and validation, decision support systems, training modules","People":"Healthcare providers, public health officers, decision-makers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health agencies, AI system developers"}]}
